title: Cryptornd
author: Cryptornd
content: This Advice Is for Altcoin investors Donot invest in Crypto projects which is trying to Doing What ethereum does . focus on new technologies, new solutions And new visions. cheap  And fast  transactions And Deapps are not only blockchain based solutions in Crypto industry . there are more innovative solutions in this space . just think what Polkadot trying to do. comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptornd on June 21, 2022, 07:33:22 AMThis Advice Is for Altcoin investors Donot invest in Crypto projects which is trying to Doing What ethereum does . focus on new technologies, new solutions And new visions. cheap  And fast  transactions And Deapps are not only blockchain based solutions in Crypto industry . there are more innovative solutions in this space . just think what Polkadot trying to do. Polkadot is trying to design an ecosystem which every blockchain can transact data with each other. Well i only partly agree with your advice here. In the end Ethereum was the first blockchain ecosystem that brought the smart contract functionality to the crypto space and that changed pretty much everything. Without smart contracts we would not have real DEX's like Uniswap or Pancakeswap, we would not be able to yield farm or stake or assets in single asset staking pools or to provide liquidity for pools. Without smart contracts there would be no Defi which is the biggest selling point for cryptos at the moment.Blockchains like the Binance Smart Chain for example or almost 1 to 1 copies of Ethereum with the little (but important) difference that the fees on BSC are way lower than on Ethereum at the moment.

comments.author: Godwinpaul
comments.body: It's actually difficult to find a project that is totally new. Most times New projects work on the lapses of existing projects and with that, the industry is developing. There are many more projects that are doing better than ethereum, maybe not in value, but in other features which most people find important. The issue of ethereum scalability has been extensively delayed, maybe due to the ethereum 2.0 delay or something unknown to us. These new projects has been able to successfully pass that and it has helped in curbing the cost of transactions.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: And why not? Those projects that present the same smart contract platforms as Ethereum are also growing and developing well, which is not the case for projects that present something completely new. In cryptocurrency, what matters is reach and the ability to attract as much of the community as possible, even in already established solutions. And new technologies sometimes do not have integration with major projects or have narrow opportunities for use, so big money does not flow there, and as a result, it turns out that the project is innovative, but no one needs it.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: Copying the original product is not a real business model. Imitation products cannot compete with real products. We don't need to discuss this...Ethereum is constantly criticized for its high transaction fees. I am also critical of this problem. That's why we sometimes rightfully look for alternatives. But it is a fact that Ethereum is unrivaled in Layer 1 technology. Because all developers create projects on Ethereum technology. This alone is reason enough not to give up on Ethereum. I would also like a better alternative than Ethereum, but for now we have to comply with these conditions.

comments.body: Quote from: Cryptornd on June 21, 2022, 07:33:22 AMDonot invest in Crypto projects which is trying to Doing What ethereum does . focus on new technologies, new solutions And new visions. cheap  And fast  transactions And Deapps are not only blockchain based solutions in Crypto industry . Unfortunately, many also consider that they can beat Ethereum or become the next Ethereum. But so far, what we can see? Nothing can beat Ethereum. However, actually, there are also several projects that offer their own network and blockchain that are also worthy, but I personally will not compare or say to replace Ethereum. Because they will always have their own weakness and strength.
